column4: I am trying to setup my computer to work with its svideo output to the tv.  When I have tried this in the past I have messed up X and I cant get it back, so I have to reinstall linux, and I don't want to do that again.  What files do I need to make backups of so that I can restore them if I skrew up again without having to reinstall ubuntu again
as far as X goes, you really just need to back up /etc/X11/xorg.con
